channel.title: Peter Thiel on Adrián Moreno Peña · Web & Mobile Developer, all-around coder

item.title: Zero to One: Notes on Startups, or How to Build the Future
item.description: A guide for entrepreneurs on how to create and grow successful startups. It’s mainly related with entrepreneurship, including how to identify and pursue unique business opportunities, how to build and scale a successful company, and how to overcome common challenges faced by startups. It’s based on the notes from a class that Thiel gave - so it’s very practical and to the point.
